item.title: Start Multiple Instances Ideas
item.description: sometimes we need to start service with multiple instances with different ports, but default IDEA would not let to do that, how to do that? click the right upper inverted triangle of “Application”, then click “Edit Configurations” Check the checkbox “Allow parallel run”
